title: Understanding Digital Influence
text: Digital platforms have revolutionized shopping by offering features that enhance convenience and personalization.

hintAnswer: They offer personalized recommendations based on browsing history.
title: Personalized Recommendations
text: One of the primary ways digital platforms influence shopping is by providing tailored suggestions based on user data.
choices: They offer personalized recommendations based on browsing history
They provide a platform for customer reviews
They allow for price comparison across multiple stores
They enable direct communication with sellers
